134.content:
Ash pulled out the attire in the bag, it was a Jr. outfit for Team Rocket.
"What is this doing here?" Ash asked himself, he heard rustling coming from the bushes behind him and turned to see a swarm of Beedrill approaching. "Pikachu! Thunderbolt!" Ash yelled in a panic, forgetting that he had been separated from his partner, he screamed and ducked as the beedrill quickly flew past him, their razor sharp wings grazing against him. He stayed on the ground for a few moments after the Beedrill had past, whimpering slightly. When he was certain they were gone he stood up, wobbly for some reason. He looked down at his clothes and noticed that the Beedrill had torn them to shreds, he groaned as he turned to his bag, which was also completely ruined. He glanced down at the Team Rocket uniform that was left untouched, he stared at it for a moment before shaking his head. "No...way...won't...wear...them..." Ash told himself, wheezing between each word, he was suddenly out of breath and finding it hard to move, he continued to look at the uniform and eventually just put it on.
"There you are!" Ash jumped as he heard someone approach, he turned to see a blue haired man wearing a Team Rocket uniform, the man walk up to Ash and smirked at him. "You sure gave me a fright, the Boss would be furious if he found out I lost you." Ash tried to protest but couldn't speak, what was happening to him, he took a step back in shock. "Don't worry, he scares me too," the grunt admitted, mistaking Ash's shock for fear. "Don't worry, you won't have to meet him until you become a fully fledged member." The man grabbed Ash by the arm and threw him on his back, unable to fight back. "You've worked hard today, I think you earned yourself a piggy back." Ash was dumbfounded, why couldn't he speak, or fight back? His eyes widdened when he realised, the Beedrill, one must have scrapped him with its stinger, he was poisoned. Ash noticed his conscious slipping, he had to do something, he couldn't be taken to Team Rocket Headquarters, try as he may he ended up falling asleep on the grunts back.

1342.content:
Ash rolled around in his sleep, slowing stirring into consciousness. He stretched his legs and arms out as he opened his eyes, feeling kinda weird. He shot up when he realised he had no idea where he was. He was in a plain white room, in the room was the single bed he was on with a red blanket, along with a red dresser to the other side of the room, there was a door leading out on the far wall. Ash tried to remember what had happened, he was in a forrest of some sort, he was separated from pikachu and then...then...
"The Beedrill!" Ash announced, remembering now, he was poisoned and some Team Rocket Grunt mistook him for a Jr member. This certainly was one huge mess Ash got himself into. The ebony haired boy jumped as the blue-haired grunt opened the door and peaked his head inside.
"Hey, you awake?" he asked, looking over to you. He smiled and walked inside. "Good, you've got a pretty big day today, you may not have gotten that Ratatta yesterday but where we're going you'll find even better pokemon!" Ash didn't know how to respond, he was NOT going to join Team Rocket, they were evil! But he couldn't have the grunt think he wasn't a Jr. Member, he couldn't risk a fight in Team Rocket's base, especially without Pikachu. "Come on, get up!" the grunt encouraged, "I can't change your diaper with you under your sheets."
"Wait! What?" Ash asked, completely dumbfounded, it was only then that Ash actually took notice to what he was wearing. He was in black pyjamas with the Team Rocket Symbol on them and now that he was told there was no mistaking that there was a puffy diaper wrapped around his waist.
"It's not that bad," the grunt rolled his eyes, "It's not like I don't change you on a regular basis." Robin was absolutely horrified when the Grunt picked him up and laid him down on the dresser, which apparently doubled up as a changing table.
"I don't need you to change me!" Ash shouted, trying to resist. The man took off his shirt with relative ease and yanked off his pants shortly after, Ash was only ten after all and not overly strong. When his pants were removed Ash was in complete denial, he now had a clear view of his diaper and it was definitely USED!
"Don't need a change huh?" the grunt smirked, "I suppose your diaper can magically change itself?" Ash didn't understand, why was he messy? He didn't even wet the bed, there was no way he should have pooped. It must have been the poison, he was so disorientated that he shit himself. Do you tell her the truth or lie?

Dawn stripped off Ash’s Chansey costume leaving him in his Jigglypuff pull up and dragged him over to a chair and placed him on her lap roughly and holding him down with one and spanking him with the other each spank getting gradually harder.

15523111112221311111.title: #panking him

choices: The girls play nicely with him
155231111122213111111.content:
Dawn likes the jigglepuff costume, but has something else in mind. So instead of putting him back in it she brings him a short princess-dress with white knee socks, marry jane and – to Ash’s horror – a training bra.

“No, no no! I will not wear that!” Ash said in a still weak voice, while he wipes the last tear from his eyes.

Dawn ignores his words and gives a little slap on his still hurting behind making him passive and obedient again, enough for her to dress him.

Looking into a tall mirror makes Ash blush deep red. The training bra gives him the frame of a young girl, which is underlined by the rest of his outfit and his pigtails.

“Now you play nicely with the other girls and I don’t want to hear any complains, or you will find yourself over my knees again, understood – little girl?” Dawn said in a very strict tone.

Afraid to be spanked again Ash nods his head and walks over to the three girls that play happily with their dolls. None of them is older than 6, but he is the only one wearing a pull-up – he is sure.

15523111112222.content:
Ash is WAY to ashamed to tell nurse Joy that he clamped down his bladder as soon as he could, not to mention his hurting belly that wants to be emptied as well. He really hope to find a way out of the nursery and is able to make it to the next bathroom – soon.

“No, I am fine, it was just a little accident.” Ash’s says and blushes at his own words.

“Well, not that little.” Nurse Joy says and cleans Ash’s behind and crotch with wet wipes before she pull a fresh pull-up up his legs.

“Can I play in the garden now?” Ash asks.

Unfortunately that is not planned for the moment. Nurse Joy takes him by his hand and guides him into an almost dark room with a row of cribs.
“After lunch we have nap-time, so you need to wait a bit before you can play with the other girls, Ashley.” Nurse Joy smiles as she lifts him into the crib and raise the rail on the side.

“But..” Ash wants to complain, but Joy silence him with a pink pacifier.

“Hush little girl, it is time for a little nap, now lie down and sleep tight.” She says and give him a kiss on the forehead.


After she left the room Ash tried to climb out of the Crib before he use his trainers for the second time within an hour.

info.brief_description: Fellow along as Ash is put through life altering events by pokémon and humans.
info.description:
Watch and laugh at Ash as he goes through life changing events and ends up completely different by the end.

Okay this is my first ever interactive so feedback is appreciated.

1. Absolutely no chapters involving vore, unbirthing, incest, rape, sex between minors, or foot fetish if I see any of them written they will be deleted without warning.

2. No ending the story without finishing a story and no one choice only chapters.

3. No killing off characters.

4. Sex is allowed but not detailed graphically if I see any of that they will be deleted.

5. Have fun and try not to break the rules. If you do break them three times I will ban you from making entries and all your chapters will be deleted.

Congrats guys we hit a hundred additions but we still have so many open storylines to be explored so get out there and write.

We've just hit two hundred entries and 1.5K views! You guys are awesome
